column4: hey guys, I want to dual boot two linux OS.  I have one installed now.  I understand that I can partion the HD during installation of second os.  I'm just wondering if I will have any grub problems.  Any suggestions/comments?
Not too keen on using VM.  So if i set up for dual boot, there might be a prob using the initial system?
Cool.  But is there a chance that I might lose everything/anything in the initial OS?
u trying to dual boot windows and ubuntu?
